value:
Your commander seems strict—bet
I could learn a lot from her. Maybe
I'll join the Order of Heroes...

Different world, same deal: fight to
keep the peace and make the world
a little better.

I know you don't fight, but I'll teach
you to defend yourself. Don't worry.
I won't hurt ya too bad!

Sometime let's you and me ride my
horse out to the forest and get
some quiet.

Whew—just got done training! I'm
from a long line of knights, but I
still gotta earn the title myself.

Hey, nice to meet ya. I'm actually
just here to say hi to you from
$Nf.
Good. Training's paying off.
I can do better than THIS.
Dammit!

Ready to smash heads! ...Is that
still my job?

Hey. I'm Sully. Count on me to do
my best. And between you and me?
My best is pretty damn good.

Hey, you gonna be fighting by
our side again today? Good to
hear, $Nu.$k$pFighting here has been a great
experience for me. And you're
pretty damn inspiring, you know?$k$pI know you can't fight directly, but
you still always seem like the
biggest deal on the field.$k$pSomeday maybe I'll inspire courage
in my allies like you do. That's my
dream since I came here.$k$pUntil that dream comes true,
I guess I'll just have to stay near
you! Thanks, partner.
てやっ！
このおっ！
うわっ！
Damn!
I'll kill you TWICE!
The hell with YOU!
Oh, no you don't!
Die, dammit!
You beat me.
Haha
You ready to be my sparring partner?
A lot of guys have underestimated me. They're dead now.
Hey, come train with me! I'll go easy on ya.
Just so we're clear... I am not cut out for kitchen duty.
My horse is a beaut, right? Best partner I could ask for.
Gotta train hard if I'm gonna match the Bull. That guy was a legend.
I'll protect you on the field—you just focus on giving orders.
Yeah.
Got it.
Let's go.
